instruction: Where can I find the official academic calendar for year 2025-2026?
response:
The official 2025-2026 academic calendar is available on the Missouri State University Registrar's website.

It includes key dates for:
• Fall, Spring, and Summer semesters
• Intersession periods
• Holidays and university closings
• Registration deadlines

**Resources:**
You can view the full calendar here: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
We recommend bookmarking this link and adding important dates (like registration and final exams) to your personal calendar.

instruction: When does the full 2025-2026 calendar with all the grading deadlines come out?
response:
The complete 2025-2026 academic calendar, which includes grading deadlines, is already published by the Registrar.

**Key Details:**
• General grading deadlines are listed on the main calendar.
• Specific drop and refund deadlines are found in the fee payment and refund schedules.

**Resources:**
• View the official calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
You can also find personalized drop and refund deadlines by logging into your My Missouri State portal.

instruction: When is the Fall Intersession in 2025?
response:
The Fall 2025 Intersession runs from **July 28, 2025, to August 15, 2025**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** July 28, 2025
• **Last Day to Drop:** August 11, 2025
• **Classes End:** August 15, 2025

**Resources:**
See the full list of dates on the official calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
If you plan to register for the intersession, be sure to check the registration and payment deadlines.

instruction: What's the last day to drop a class during the Fall Intersession 2025?
response:
The last day to drop, or declare Pass/Not-Pass or Audit for the Fall 2025 Intersession is **Monday, August 11, 2025**.

**Resources:**
This and other important dates are listed on the Registrar's calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
To drop a class, log in to your My Missouri State portal and access your registration tools before the deadline.

instruction: When does the Fall 2025 semester start?
response:
The Fall 2025 full semester and first block classes begin on **Monday, August 18, 2025**.

**Resources:**
View the full semester schedule on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Be sure to check your class schedule in My Missouri State for building and room locations before classes begin.

instruction: Do we have school on Labor Day 2025?
response:
No, **Monday, September 1, 2025**, is the Labor Day Holiday.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held.
• University offices will be closed.

**Resources:**
All university holidays are listed on the official academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2S025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Plan your study and travel schedule accordingly. Classes will resume on Tuesday, September 2, 2025.

instruction: How long is the Winter Intersession in 2026?
response:
The 2026 Winter Intersession is one week long.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** January 5, 2026
• **Last Day to Drop:** January 8, 2026
• **Classes End:** January 9, 2026

**Resources:**
View the intersession dates on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
These are fast-paced courses. Ensure you are prepared to cover all material in one week.

instruction: When are grades due for the 2026 Winter Intersession?
response:
Faculty must submit grades for the 2026 Winter Intersession by **2:00 p.m. on Tuesday, January 20, 2026**.

**Resources:**
Grading deadlines are listed on the Registrar's official calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
You can expect to see your grades posted in My Missouri State on or shortly after this deadline.

instruction: When can I register for Spring 2026 classes?
response:
Registration for the Spring 2026 semester begins in Fall 2025.

**Registration Periods:**
• **Sequenced Registration:** October 30, 2025 - November 20, 2025
• **Regular Registration:** Begins November 21, 2025

**Resources:**
Check the academic calendar for all registration periods: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Check your registration status in My Missouri State to find your specific sequenced registration date and time. Meet with your advisor to clear any holds before you can register.

instruction: How long is Winter Break for 2025-2026?
response:
The 2025-2026 Winter Break, when no classes are held and offices are closed, is from **December 22, 2025, to January 2, 2026**.

**Resources:**
View the full academic calendar for holiday dates: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Note that the Winter Intersession begins on January 5, 2026, and the regular Spring 2026 semester begins on January 12, 2026.

instruction: What are the dates for the 2026 Summer Intersession?
response:
The Summer 2026 Intersession runs from **May 11, 2026, to May 29, 2026**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** May 11, 2026
• **Memorial Day Holiday (No Classes):** May 25, 2026
• **Last Day to Drop:** May 26, 2026
• **Classes End:** May 29, 2026

**Resources:**
See the full summer schedule on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Be aware that the last day to drop is after the Memorial Day holiday.

instruction: Do we get Memorial Day off in 2026 if we're in the summer intersession?
response:
Yes, **Monday, May 25, 2026**, is the Memorial Day Holiday.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held, even for the Summer Intersession.
• University offices will be closed.

**Resources:**
All university holidays are noted on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Classes will resume on Tuesday, May 26, 2026, which is also the last day to drop the intersession class.

instruction: When does summer school start in 2026?
response:
The main Summer 2026 sessions (Sessions 1, 2, and 3) all begin on **Monday, June 1, 2026**.

There is also a later session:
• **Summer Session 4:** Begins June 29, 2026

**Resources:**
View all summer session dates on the official calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Check the specific session dates for the courses you need, as Sessions 2, 3, and 4 are shorter (4-week) formats.

instruction: Are there different summer sessions in 2026? When do they start?
response:
Yes, there are multiple summer sessions in 2026 with different start dates and lengths.

**Sessions:**
• **Summer Intersession:** May 11 - May 29, 2026
• **Summer Session 1 (8-week):** June 1 - July 24, 2026
• **Summer Session 2 (4-week):** June 1 - July 2, 2026
• **Summer Session 3 (4-week):** June 1 - June 25, 2026
• **Summer Session 4 (4-week):** June 29 - July 24, 2026

**Resources:**
See the full list of summer dates on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
When registering for summer, make sure to select the correct session for your intended course.

instruction: What are the dates for the Fall 2025 intersession?
response:
The Fall 2025 Intersession runs from **July 28, 2025, to August 15, 2025**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** July 28
• **Last Day to Drop:** August 11
• **Classes End:** August 15
• **Grades Due:** August 25

**Resources:**
See the official academic calendar for details: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Contact the department offering the course if you have questions about the fast-paced format.

instruction: Can you give me all the important dates for the Fall 2025 semester?
response:
Here are the key dates for the Fall 2025 full semester:

• **Classes Begin:** August 18, 2025
• **Labor Day Holiday (No Classes):** September 1, 2025
• **Fall Break (No Classes):** October 9-12, 2025
• **Last Day to Drop a Full Semester Class:** November 7, 2025
• **Thanksgiving Holiday (No Classes):** November 22-30, 2025
• **Classes End:** December 4, 2025
• **Final Exam Period:** December 6-11, 2025
• **Commencement:** December 12, 2025
• **Grades Viewable:** December 16, 2025

**Resources:**
For dates related to first and second block classes, see the full calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Add these dates to your personal calendar to keep track of deadlines and holidays.

instruction: When is Fall Break 2025?
response:
Fall Break 2025 is from **Thursday, October 9, through Sunday, October 12, 2025**.

**Details:**
• No classes are held during this period.
• University offices will remain open.
• Classes resume on Monday, October 13, 2025.

**Resources:**
View the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Note that this break begins after mid-semester exams, which end on October 8.

instruction: When are Fall 2025 final grades posted?
response:
Final grades for the Fall 2025 semester will be available for students to view on **Tuesday, December 16, 2025**.

**Details:**
• Faculty have until 2:00 p.m. on Monday, December 15, to submit final grades.

**Resources:**
See the 'Fall Semester 2025' section of the calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
You can check your grades by logging into your My Missouri State portal.

instruction: How long is Thanksgiving break in 2025?
response:
The 2025 Thanksgiving Holiday runs from **Saturday, November 22, through Sunday, November 30, 2025**.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held during this entire period.
• University offices will be closed from November 26-28.

**Resources:**
View all university holidays on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Plan any travel accordingly, as classes resume on Monday, December 1, 2025.

instruction: What's the last day to drop a full semester class in Fall 2025?
response:
The last day to drop or declare Pass/Not-Pass or Audit for a Fall 2025 full semester class is **Friday, November 7, 2025**.

**Resources:**
This date and other deadlines are listed on the official academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
If you need to drop a class, you must do so in your My Missouri State portal by this deadline. It is highly recommended to speak with your academic advisor and a financial aid representative first.

instruction: What's the payment plan due date in September 2025?
response:
The My Payment Plan installment for September is due on **Wednesday, September 10, 2025**.

**Resources:**
Payment plan dates are listed on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
You can make payments and manage your plan through your My Missouri State portal or the Bursar's office website.

instruction: When is the last day of finals for the Fall 2025 semester?
response:
The final exam period for the Fall 2025 semester ends on **Thursday, December 11, 2025**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Final Exam Period:** December 6 - December 11, 2025
• **Fall Commencement:** December 12, 2025

**Resources:**
View the final exam schedule on the Registrar's website: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Check the official final exam schedule (usually published mid-semester) for the specific date and time of your exams, which may differ from your regular class time.

instruction: What are the dates for the 2026 Winter Intersession?
response:
The 2026 Winter Intersession is a one-week session running from **January 5, 2026, to January 9, 2026**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** January 5
• **Last Day to Drop:** January 8
• **Classes End:** January 9
• **Grades Due:** January 20

**Resources:**
See the official academic calendar for details: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
If you plan to take a winter intersession course, registration begins with Spring 2026 registration in Fall 2025.

instruction: I need all the dates for the Spring 2026 semester, like registration and holidays.
response:
Here are the key dates for the Spring 2026 full semester:

• **Sequenced Registration:** Oct 30 - Nov 20, 2025
• **Regular Registration:** Begins Nov 21, 2025
• **Classes Begin:** January 12, 2026
• **MLK Jr. Holiday (No Classes):** January 19, 2026
• **Presidents' Day Holiday (No Classes):** February 16, 2026
• **Spring Break (No Classes):** March 14-22, 2026
• **Last Day to Drop Full Semester:** April 3, 2026
• **Classes End:** April 30, 2026
• **Final Exam Period:** May 2-7, 2026
• **Commencement:** May 8, 2026

**Resources:**
For all block-session and intersession dates, view the full calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
We recommend meeting with your advisor well before your registration date to plan your semester.

instruction: When is Spring Break 2026?
response:
Spring Break 2026 is from **Saturday, March 14, through Sunday, March 22, 2026**.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held during this period.
• University offices will remain open.
• Classes resume on Monday, March 23, 2026.

**Resources:**
View the academic calendar for all breaks: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Plan your travel and study time accordingly.

instruction: Do we get MLK day off in 2026?
response:
Yes, **Monday, January 19, 2026**, is the Martin Luther King Jr. Holiday.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held.
• University offices will be closed.

**Resources:**
All university holidays are listed on the official academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Classes will resume on Tuesday, January 20, 2026.

instruction: When are midterm grades out for Spring 2026?
response:
Midterm grades for the Spring 2026 semester will be available for students to view on **Thursday, March 12, 2026**.

**Details:**
• Faculty have until 2:00 p.m. on Wednesday, March 11, to submit midterm grades.

**Resources:**
See the 'Spring Semester 2026' section of the calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
You can check your midterm grades by logging into your My Missouri State portal. This is a good time to assess your progress and meet with professors or advisors if needed.

instruction: Do we have classes on Presidents' Day 2026?
response:
No, **Monday, February 16, 2026**, is the Presidents' Day Holiday.

**Details:**
• No classes will be held.
• University offices will be closed.

**Resources:**
View all university holidays on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Classes will resume on Tuesday, February 17, 2026.

instruction: Can you list the dates for the 2026 Summer Intersession?
response:
The 2026 Summer Intersession runs from **Monday, May 11, 2026, to Friday, May 29, 2026**.

**Key Dates:**
• **Classes Begin:** May 11
• **Memorial Day Holiday (No Classes):** May 25
• **Last Day to Drop:** May 26
• **Classes End:** May 29

**Resources:**
See the official academic calendar for details: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Remember that this is a 3-week session, so the workload will be very concentrated.

instruction: What are the dates for all the different Summer 2026 sessions?
response:
There are five different sessions available for Summer 2026.

**Summer 2026 Sessions:**
• **Summer Intersession:** May 11 - May 29
• **Summer Session 1 (8-week):** June 1 - July 24
• **Summer Session 2 (4-week):** June 1 - July 2
• **Summer Session 3 (4-week):** June 1 - June 25
• **Summer Session 4 (4-week):** June 29 - July 24

**Resources:**
See the full list of summer dates on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
When registering, double-check that the course you want is offered in the session you prefer, as not all courses are available in all sessions.

instruction: When does Summer Session 4 start in 2026?
response:
Summer Session 4 classes begin on **Monday, June 29, 2026**.

**Details:**
• This is a 4-week session.
• It ends on July 24, 2026.

**Resources:**
View all summer session options on the academic calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Registration for all summer sessions begins in Spring 2026.

instruction: Can you give me a quick overview of the 2025-2026 school year? Like the main start/end dates.
response:
Here are the main start and end dates for the 2025-2026 academic year:

• **Fall Intersession 2025:** July 28 - August 15, 2025
• **Fall Semester 2025:** August 18 - December 11, 2025
• **Winter Intersession 2026:** January 5 - January 9, 2026
• **Spring Semester 2026:** January 12 - May 7, 2026
• **Summer Intersession 2026:** May 11 - May 29, 2026
• **Summer Session 2026 (Main):** June 1 - July 24, 2026

**Resources:**
For specific holidays and deadlines, view the full calendar: https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
Use this overview to plan your academic year and any personal commitments.

instruction: What's the official link for the 2025-2026 academic calendar?
response:
You can find the official 2025-2026 academic calendar on the Registrar's website.

**Resources:**
• **Official Link:** https://www.missouristate.edu/Registrar/2025-2026-academic-calendar.htm

**Next Steps:**
This page is the best source for all official dates, deadlines, and holiday schedules. We recommend you bookmark it for future reference.
